Solve Puzzles

Ok, let's solve some puzzles. Ignore words with double letters (we don't account for them now).

query: wordle->find_words{
  where:
    word ~ r'[T]'
    and word ~ r'...[^T].'
    and word !~ r'[SLAE]'
}

query: wordle->find_words{
  where:
    word ~ r'[T]'
    and word ~ r'[^T]O.[^T].'
    and word !~ r'[SLAEUCH]'
}

query: wordle->find_words{
  where:
    word ~ r'[T]'
    and word ~ r'[^TJ]OINT'
    and word !~ r'[SLAEUCH]'
}
